formation: 11 Personnel, Gun Trips Right Y-Off (RB Left), Play-Action Wide Zone Left

routes.L1: X iso: Deep Post (20+; bend across boundary safety)
routes.L4: RB: Play-action fake, then check-release Swing left
routes.R3: Y-off: Seam/Bender 20+ (read field safety; bend away from leverage)
routes.R2: Slot: Switch-Release Speed Corner 18–22 to numbers (honey-hole)
routes.R1: Z: Switch-Release Go (inside-over to cap CB/S)

rationale: R3 seam (high) with R2 speed-corner (intermediate) puts the field safety in a high-low bind while L1’s post freezes the boundary safety. Progression: Alert L1 Post vs 1-high -> Primary R2 Corner -> Secondary R3 Seam if S drives -> Checkdown L4 Swing.
